mapper.sql: T.id as T_id, T.uname as T_uname, T.pwd as T_pwd, T.status as T_status, T.phone as T_phone, T.type as T_type
mapper.select: select * from user T where T.id = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.insert:
insert into user
id,
uname,
pwd,
status,
phone,
type,

mapper.update:
update user
uname = #{uname,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
pwd = #{pwd,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
status = #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER},
phone = #{phone,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
photo = #{photo,jdbcType=BLOB},
type = #{type,jdbcType=INTEGER},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

update user set uname = #{uname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, pwd = #{pwd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, status = #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER}, phone = #{phone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, type = #{type,jdbcType=INTEGER} where id = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
